title: Forgotten Honeymoon
description: “How can I be pregnant when I’ve never had sex?”Kelly isn’t worried about the three weeks she can’t remember after a minor car accident -- until two months later when she discovers that she is pregnant.Obviously she had sex, although she can’t remember it now. But the important question is: who is the father?Forgotten Honeymoon is a sweet, quirky, contemporary romance
author: Beverly Farr
